readable.title: 2173677067_9d0732bcc2
readable.content: A little girl dances in a grassy field , another girl is in the background . A little girl in a white blouse and blue pants frolics on the grass . A little girl in blue panes dances on the grass . A small girl standing on one leg in the grass , with another child in the background . There are two small children playing in a yard .
